title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Mix eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture. Stir well.
Serve with a sprinkle of black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices overnight.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Prepare the creamy tomato gravy in a pan.
Combine grilled chicken with the gravy.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
